bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Abbreviated Designation pi fu feng 皮膚風.

Pathological Condition Combined Designation of pi zhen 皮疹 , skin papules; chuan zhong 瘡腫 , sores and swelling; tuo xie 脫屑 , desquamation, and sao yang 瘙癢 , itching. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Bai bing zhu zhi yao 百病主治藥：鼠粘子，除膚風，利小便 , “ Shu zhan zi serves to remove skin wind and facilitates urination”. Fu gan 腹疳 , abdominal gan -illness [2]
Pathological Condition identical with ding xi 丁奚 , pin-slave [condition]. Ben cao tu jing 本草圖經 Substance Entry zhi zhu 蜘 蛛：小兒腹疳者，燒熟啖之 , “Burn it and feed it to children with abdominal gan -illness ”.
